author: The Current
description:
What if you turned on the radio and heard your song on a loop? It happened to Soul Asylum.
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

During a recent video to The Current studio, Soul Asylum reflected on the period earlier in 2025 when their song, "Somebody to Shove," was used as the anchor of a publicity stunt when another Minneapolis-area radio station adjusted its format. "It came as a really hilarious, pleasant sort of surprise," Dave Pirner says. 

Musicians
David Pirner - Lead Singer 
Ryan Smith - Lead Guitar
Jeremy Tappero - Bass Player

Credits

title: Soul Asylum talk about when their song "Somebody to Shove" was used in a radio stunt
